lyrics:
44 contributorspain lyricsintro
pain without love
pain i cant get enough
pain i like it rough
cause id rather feel pain than nothing at all

verse 1
youre sick of feeling numb
youre not the only one
ill take you by the hand
and ill show you a world that you can understand

verse 2
this life is filled with hurt
when happiness doesnt work
trust me and take my hand
when the lights go out youll understand
